verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> shall not enter פְצֽוּעַ־ <S%H6481><s%> one דַּכָּ֛א <S%H1795><s%> wounded וּכְר֥וּת <S%H3772><s%> cut off שָׁפְכָ֖ה <S%H8212><s%> or hath his privy member בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall not enter מַמְזֵ֖ר <S%H4464><s%> A bastard בִּקְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> of his even דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation עֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> even to his tenth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> none יָ֥בֹא <S%H935><s%> shall he not enter ל֖וֹ בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> shall not enter עַמּוֹנִ֛י <S%H5984><s%> An Ammonite וּמוֹאָבִ֖י <S%H4125><s%> or Moabite בִּקְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> of their even דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation עֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> even to their tenth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> none יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall they not enter לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against דְּבַ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> Because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קִדְּמ֤וּ <S%H6923><s%> they met אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּלֶּ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> you not with bread וּבַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> and with water בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֣ם <S%H3318><s%> when ye came forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> and because שָׂכַ֨ר <S%H7936><s%> and because they hired עָלֶ֜יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> against thee Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בְּע֗וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor מִפְּת֛וֹר <S%H6604><s%> of Pethor אֲרַ֥ם נַהֲרַ֖יִם <S%H763><s%> of Mesopotamia לְקַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H7043><s%> to curse

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> was not אָבָ֞ה <S%H14><s%> would יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Nevertheless the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> unto Balaam וַיַּהֲפֹךְ֩ <S%H2015><s%> turned יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֧יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְּךָ֛ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> the curse לִבְרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> into a blessing כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because אֲהֵֽבְךָ֖ <S%H157><s%> loved יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto thee because the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> Thou shalt not seek שְׁלֹמָ֖ם <S%H7965><s%> their peace וְטֹבָתָ֑ם <S%H2896><s%> nor their prosperity כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3117><s%> all thy days לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְתַעֵ֣ב <S%H8581><s%> Thou shalt not abhor אֲדֹמִ֔י <S%H130><s%> an Edomite כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> for he [is] thy brother ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ס לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְתַעֵ֣ב <S%H8581><s%> thou shalt not abhor מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> an Egyptian כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because גֵ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> because thou wast a stranger הָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become בְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> in his land

בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> The children אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִוָּלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> that are begotten לָהֶ֖ם דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation שְׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> in their third יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> of them shall enter לָהֶ֖ם בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> goeth forth מַחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> When the host עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> against thine enemies וְנִ֨שְׁמַרְתָּ֔ <S%H8104><s%> then keep מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> every דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thing רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> thee from every wicked

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If there be among you any man אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> is not טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> that is not clean מִקְּרֵה־ <S%H7137><s%> by reason of uncleanness that chanceth לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> him by night וְיָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> then shall he go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> out of the camp לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> he shall not come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> within הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִפְנֽוֹת־ <S%H6437><s%> cometh on עֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> But it shall be when evening יִרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> he shall wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> [himself] with water וּכְבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> is down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> and when the sun יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וְיָד֙ <S%H3027><s%> Thou shalt have a place also תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֔ מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וְיָצָ֥אתָ <S%H3318><s%> whither thou shalt go forth שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there חֽוּץ׃ <S%H2351><s%> abroad

וְיָתֵ֛ד <S%H3489><s%> And thou shalt have a paddle תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לְךָ֖ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> among אֲזֵנֶ֑ךָ <S%H240><s%> upon thy weapon וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall have בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֣ <S%H3427><s%> and it shall be when thou wilt ease ח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> thyself abroad וְחָפַרְתָּ֣ה <S%H2658><s%> thou shalt dig בָ֔הּ וְשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H7725><s%> therewith and shalt turn back וְכִסִּ֥יתָ <S%H3680><s%> and cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֵאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6627><s%> that which cometh

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Since יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> walketh בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst מַחֲנֶ֗ךָ <S%H4264><s%> of thy camp לְהַצִּֽילְךָ֙ <S%H5337><s%> to deliver וְלָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> thee and to give up אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> thine enemies לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַחֲנֶ֖יךָ <S%H4264><s%> thee therefore shall thy camp קָד֑וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> be holy וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not יִרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> that he see בְךָ֙ עֶרְוַ֣ת <S%H6172><s%> no unclean דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> thing וְשָׁ֖ב <S%H7725><s%> in thee and turn away מֵאַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H310><s%> from thee ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַסְגִּ֥יר <S%H5462><s%> Thou shalt not deliver עֶ֖בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֲדֹנָ֑יו <S%H113><s%> unto his master אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִנָּצֵ֥ל <S%H5337><s%> which is escaped אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <S%H113><s%> from his master

עִמְּךָ֞ <S%H5973><s%> with יֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> He shall dwell בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <S%H7130><s%> with thee [even] among בַּמָּק֧וֹם <S%H4725><s%> you in that place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> which he shall choose בְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> in one שְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates בַּטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> where it liketh him best ל֑וֹ לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תּוֹנֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H3238><s%> thou shalt not oppress ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> None תִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be no קְדֵשָׁ֖ה <S%H6948><s%> There shall be no whore מִבְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be a קָדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6945><s%> nor a sodomite מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יִשְׂרָאֵל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָבִיא֩ <S%H935><s%> Thou shalt not bring אֶתְנַ֨ן <S%H868><s%> the hire זוֹנָ֜ה <S%H2181><s%> of a whore וּמְחִ֣יר <S%H4242><s%> or the price כֶּ֗לֶב <S%H3611><s%> of a dog בֵּ֛ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נֶ֑דֶר <S%H5088><s%> for any vow כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> of these תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> these [are] abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> for even both

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַשִּׁ֣יךְ <S%H5391><s%> Thou shalt not lend upon usury לְאָחִ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> to thy brother נֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> usury כֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of money נֶ֣שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> usury אֹ֑כֶל <S%H400><s%> of victuals נֶ֕שֶׁךְ <S%H5392><s%> usury כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything דָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> of any thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשָּֽׁךְ׃ <S%H5391><s%> that is lent upon usury

לַנָּכְרִ֣י <S%H5237><s%> Unto a stranger תַשִּׁ֔יךְ <S%H5391><s%> thou mayest lend upon usury וּלְאָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> but unto thy brother לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַשִּׁ֑יךְ <S%H5391><s%> thou shalt not lend upon usury לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יְבָרֶכְךָ֜ <S%H1288><s%> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H4916><s%> thee in all that thou settest יָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִדֹּ֥ר <S%H5087><s%> When thou shalt vow נֶ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5088><s%> a vow לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְאַחֵ֖ר <S%H309><s%> thou shalt not slack לְשַׁלְּמ֑וֹ <S%H7999><s%> to pay כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When דָּרֹ֨שׁ <S%H1875><s%> will surely יִדְרְשֶׁ֜נּוּ <S%H1875><s%> require יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> it for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> it of thee and it would be sin

וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> if תֶחְדַּ֖ל <S%H2308><s%> But if thou shalt forbear לִנְדֹּ֑ר <S%H5087><s%> to vow לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> it shall be no sin

מוֹצָ֥א <S%H4161><s%> That which is gone out שְׂפָתֶ֖יךָ <S%H8193><s%> of thy lips תִּשְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> thou shalt keep וְעָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and perform כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what נָדַ֜רְתָּ <S%H5087><s%> according as thou hast vowed לַיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God נְדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> [even] a freewill offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> which thou hast promised בְּפִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> with thy mouth ס

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> When thou comest בְּכֶ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> vineyard רֵעֶ֔ךָ <S%H7453><s%> into thy neighbour's וְאָכַלְתָּ֧ <S%H398><s%> then thou mayest eat עֲנָבִ֛ים <S%H6025><s%> grapes כְּנַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> at thine own pleasure שָׂבְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7648><s%> thy fill וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about כֶּלְיְךָ֖ <S%H3627><s%> [any] in thy vessel לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> but thou shalt not put ס
